data.name: Action Entities
data.detailed_description:
A game with monsters in which there are 3 unique maps.

Island (Night) - on this map, you need to fight off monsters or be a monster yourself and destroy the survivors.

Planet nag - this map is in the style of team battle, capture the altars of nag to defeat the enemy.

Ancient building - choose a character and go into battle, accumulate the most points in a given time by killing players and monsters.
data.about_the_game:
A game with monsters in which there are 3 unique maps.

Island (Night) - on this map, you need to fight off monsters or be a monster yourself and destroy the survivors.

Planet nag - this map is in the style of team battle, capture the altars of nag to defeat the enemy.

Ancient building - choose a character and go into battle, accumulate the most points in a given time by killing players and monsters.
data.short_description: A multiplayer game with anti-gravity mechanics and unique worlds in which you need to fight off monsters. Original graphics, glowing plants, the environment, and perfectly selected music make the gameplay rich and entertaining.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 CPU 650 @3.2GHZ
  • Memory: 750 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 CPU 650 @3.2GHZ
  • Memory: 750 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 200 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

data.legal_notice:
Are You With Us(music created by Wontolla) - https://soundcloud.com/iamwontolla/are-you-with-us

Spartacus(music created by David Fau Casquel) - https://archive.org/details/FreeMetalSongs

I Can't Stop(music created by Punch Deck) - https://soundcloud.com/punch-deck/i-cant-stop

Elegy Of Death PT 2(music created by Robert Austin) - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=60G0arnasEc

Horror Ambience 10(music created by klankbeeld) - https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/sounds/133100/

A horror sound effect created by Ezergon was used - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=azPuzbblctw&t=31s

Special thanks to the MediaCharger channel, which has collected a huge number of soundtracks - https://www.youtube.com/user/MediaCharger/

3dtextures.me(the textures presented on this site were used) - https://3dtextures.me/

The sounds of the magnetosphere of the planets Venus, Jupiter and Saturn, created by NASA, were used
